title: Scaffolding-Based Dental Simulation Education Design: Enhancing Restorative Dentistry Practical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Hybrid Use of Smartphone-Based VR Simulation and Low-Cost Phantom Head Equipment

learning_goals: Learners can perform caries lesion removal procedures with 90% accuracy in a three-stage scaffolding simulation.
Learners acquire the technical skill to achieve at least 85% marginal seal integrity when placing composite resin restorations.
By receiving real-time feedback at least three times via a digital assessment system, learners can reduce procedural errors by 70%.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
